description:
SPEAR is the elite personal development system for men.

If you want to thrive in the 21st Century, this is the training that you missed in school. We cover everything from business success to social skills to mindfulness --- and SPEAR forges modern day warriors working together to build a better world and achieve victory. 


SPEAR is led by the best.

This is a course where you can learn from experts and develop skills and knowledge in every vital area of your life. Our Instructors have been featured in leading publications including Men's Health, LifeHack, and Inc Magazine.


What can I expect in the Intro Course?

This is an introduction to the SPEAR curriculum, the trainers, and the legend that we are writing together. All modern day heroes are encouraged to join us as we develop our full potential and build a better planet.
title: SPEAR : Superhuman Training for Men
